meanings.definition: Having a bouncier or more lively quality.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was jouncier than the older dog.
meanings.sent2: The playground was filled with jouncier equipment for the children to play on.
meanings.sent3: The jouncier music made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as jouncier as a spring breeze.
meanings.sent5: The jouncier colors of the flowers brightened up the garden.

meanings.sent1: The new mattress was jouncier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The trampoline felt jouncier after it was repaired.
meanings.sent3: The jouncier ball bounced higher than the others.
meanings.sent4: His steps were as jouncier as a kangaroo's.
meanings.sent5: The jouncier car ride made the kids giggle with joy.
